descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]Armor type :[/size][/b] light armor
[b][size=3]Body :[/size][/b] UNPB-TBBP
[b][size=3]Weight slider :[/size][/b] Not support(always 1.0)
[b][size=3]Parts :[/size][/b][list=1] [*]neck-band(slot:42, Circlet keyword)
[*]cuirass(slot:52 or slot:32, Body keyword)
[*]upperarm-band(slot:57, Gauntlet keyword)
[*]thigh-band(slot:49, boots keyword)

[/list][b][size=3]Recipe :[/size][/b]
    linen wrap and leather strips.
[size=3][b]Required :
[/b][/size][list=1]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XPMS[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url][/size]
[/list][size=2][size=3][b]Cresit[/b][/size] :
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] by Blessed Redux Project team
[/size]XP32, Groovtama, thank you for great skeleton.
author: gekkou1992

files.name: Lace Armor For UNPB-TBBP
files.changelogHtml: Added slot-32 cuirass. This has a body mesh. Use "Lace Armor with Torso" if your body mesh and cuirass don't match.
